task.summary: Decreased Action Bar Tab's font size.
Actionbar tabs changes to a simple stretch.
Add bg color & dividers to sidebar navigation menu.
Better quality for splash screen logo.
Закинул в папку проекта иконки для сайдбара.
Added dialog to check GAPPS installed.
Done some refactoring with GAPPS method stubs.
Basic location client created (getting last location).
Requesting and showing up current location in 30 seconds each.
Camera moving with driver's location changing.
Failed try to draw polylines. Now will try a lot more easier way.
Constructed polyline route as the car is going.
Changed the polyline color to purple.
Smoothly animate camera to updated position.
Scaled down settings icon in left navbar.
Basic black button layout; hiding actionbar tabs on start recording.
Route draws as solid purple line.
Added icons to black slide button.
Input Activity created; save button added.
Little fixes of input layout dimensions.
Side navbar's item changes bg on tap.
Divided duration bar by two, added distance counter.
Updated time and distance counter weights.
Final version of time and distance counters bar.
Final version of time and distance counters bar.
Final version of time and distance counters bar.
Work on custom list adapter for trip stats.
New stats icon added to navigation drawer.
Light screen background to entire theme.
Improved edittext color and hint logic in Input Activity.
Checking for user session on startup and displaying Sign In if needed.
Correct check for empty fields in Login Activity.
Correct check now is also on Sign Up page.
Correct check now is also on Sign Up page.
Uppercase the first letter of Parse error message.
Darker summary header text, extracted styles from it's layout.
Правильно открывает экраны по тапу в навбаре.
Action bar background and tabs divider defined.
Hide tabs on record, show on pause.
Заменил на версию с рисочками. Сейчас посмотрю чем отличаются (Гитхаб удобно показывает) и исправлю.
Основную функцию табов реализовал. Осталось только дизайн точно подогнать.
Fixed icon padding in action bar tabs.
Summary layout table divided by two columns.
Additional notes field is now also filled in with black color.
Сейчас буду таймер на секундомер изменять.
Ability stop and resume timer countdown added.
Location client invocation by tap on the record button.
Начинаю подстаивать приложения под requirements индуса.
По UI вроде все соответствует требованиям в Ворде.
